Package de.oth.blocklib.disasters.volcanos

Class GrowingVolcano

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.disasters.Disaster
de.oth.blocklib.disasters.ChunkAllocatingDisaster
de.oth.blocklib.disasters.volcanos.GrowingVolcano
public class GrowingVolcano
extends ChunkAllocatingDisaster
The GrowingVolcano Disaster. A ChunkAllocatingDisaster that causes a volcano to be build at a given position.
Author:
Tobias Mueller

  • Constructor Details

    • GrowingVolcano

      public GrowingVolcano​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f center, float height, float growthDurationInSec)
      Creates a new GrowingVolcano. Should be added to a DisasterManager, so it gets automatically updated.
      Parameters:
      center - the center position on the ground, where the volcano should grow from
      height - the height the growing volcano should reach
      growthDurationInSec - the time over which the volcano should grow

  • Method Details

    • onAllocationFinished

      public void onAllocationFinished()
      Description copied from class: ChunkAllocatingDisaster
      Can be overridden to add functionality. Is called once, when all required Chunks were successfully created.
      Specified by:
      onAllocationFinished in class ChunkAllocatingDisaster

      Description copied from class: Disaster
      Method that can be overwritten to include functionality that should be called once in every frame of the BlockLib.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time that has passed since the last update.
